member.name: T:MpqLib.Mpq.CArchive
member.summary: Represents an MPQ archive which contains a number of files. Files can be imported/exported.

member.name: T:MpqLib.Mpq.EArchiveFormat
member.summary: Enumerates the available MPQ formats.

member.name: F:MpqLib.Mpq.EArchiveFormat.Version4
member.summary: Added with Cataclym

member.name: F:MpqLib.Mpq.EArchiveFormat.Version3
member.summary: Added with Cataclym

member.name: F:MpqLib.Mpq.EArchiveFormat.Version2
member.summary: Represents later MPQ version (archive > 4Gb).

member.name: F:MpqLib.Mpq.EArchiveFormat.Version1
member.summary: Represents early MPQ version (archive < 4Gb).

member.name: T:MpqLib.Mpq.EEncryption
member.summary: Enumerates the available encryption formats.

member.name: F:MpqLib.Mpq.EEncryption.EncryptedWithFixedSeed
member.summary: Represents encryption using a fixed seed based on filename and hashtable location.

member.name: F:MpqLib.Mpq.EEncryption.Encrypted
member.summary: Represents encryption.

member.name: F:MpqLib.Mpq.EEncryption.None
member.summary: Represents no encryption.

member.name: T:MpqLib.Mpq.ECompression
member.summary: Enumerates the available compression formats.

member.name: F:MpqLib.Mpq.ECompression.WaveStereo
member.summary: Represents extended wave (stereo) compression.

member.name: F:MpqLib.Mpq.ECompression.WaveMono
member.summary: Represents extended wave (mono) compression.

member.name: F:MpqLib.Mpq.ECompression.BZip2
member.summary: Represents extended BZip2 compression.

member.name: F:MpqLib.Mpq.ECompression.PKWareDCL
member.summary: Represents extended PKWare DCL compression.

member.name: F:MpqLib.Mpq.ECompression.ZLib
member.summary: Represents extended ZLIB compression.

member.name: F:MpqLib.Mpq.ECompression.Huffman
member.summary: Represents extended huffman compression (used for wave files only).

member.name: F:MpqLib.Mpq.ECompression.Implode
member.summary: Represents implode compression, PKWARE Data Compression Library.

member.name: F:MpqLib.Mpq.ECompression.None
member.summary: Represents no compression.

member.name: T:MpqLib.Mpq.EQuality
member.summary: Enumerates the available quality formats.

member.name: F:MpqLib.Mpq.EQuality.High
member.summary: Represents high quality (large filesize).

member.name: F:MpqLib.Mpq.EQuality.Medium
member.summary: Represents medium quality (normal filesize).

member.name: F:MpqLib.Mpq.EQuality.Low
member.summary: Represents low quality (small filesize).
